verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have searched the whole world over, Looking for the things That I thought would fill my heart And ease my pain. I can climb the highest mountains, Or sail beyond the seas, And it always brings me back to You again, cause{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It’s amazing how You love me. It’s amazing how You care. It’s amazing how you’re always thinking of me. All the time, everywhere.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There are times when I feel lonely And twisted up inside On who I am and what I want to be. There’s a yearning deep inside of me, And a longing to be free, And it always brings me back to You again, cause{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It’s amazing how You love me. It’s amazing how You care. It’s amazing how you’re always thinking of me. All the time, everywhere.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Bridge) I have lived my life an outlaw on the run, Leaving broken hearted dreams for everyone. But no matter what I do, and no matter what I’ve done You always bring me back to You again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It’s amazing how You love me. It’s amazing how You care. It’s amazing how you’re always thinking of me. All the time, everywhere.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I can look the whole world over, Thinking that I’ll find Another one who’ll know me like You do. But no matter where I go, And no matter where I search, It’ll always bring me back to You again, cause…{/lang-eng}
